title: Physics of Superconductors Polycyclic Aromatic Hydrocarbons (PAH)
content: In this work, we will study metallic clusters equivalent to the organic ones intercalated with metals, of solid benzene type, Ba anthracene and K3.45picene; and we will try to calculate its superconducting Tc, for each of these compounds, from electronic correlations at room temperature. We will also study metal hydrides and clusters, totally composed of metals, which adopt forms analogous to molecular organic picene and anthracene; also calculating its TC.
